about_the_game:
The Zeta Leporis RTS demo includes the game's tutorial and a single player demo match, a 4 player free-for-all on a fully random map. Most of the current features of Zeta Leporis RTS are present in the demo, though match customization and saving and loading are disabled.


Among the asteroids surrounding the star Zeta Leporis, competing cybernetic vestiges of a dead civilization follow their infinite mandate to expand, exploit, and exterminate. Eternally adhering to the operational templates from the Last Great War, they interpret any life or machine form that deviates from their own build as an aberration that requires eradication. The efficiency of the machine and the mindlessness of total war...a constant cycle of rebuilding and destruction, until, some day, there will be nothing left.



Zeta Leporis RTS is a solo dev project that is currently quite a distance from its anticipated finish line. That said, a lot of features are present already:

  • Single player mode featuring random map skirmish matches with up to 11 reasonably capable AI opponents.
  • Fighters, frigates, destroyers, cruisers, battleships, missile corvettes, defense turrets, battlestations, assimilators, and more.
  • A literal resource transfer system unique to the RTS genre.
  • Build queues and rally points, dynamic control groups, hotkeys and a navigable minimap.
  • Upgradable resource collectors and turrets, and other upgrades.
  • Options for adjusting resources and other match settings; not present in the demo.
  • A save system; not present in the demo.
  • A basic tutorial to help you get started.

name: Zeta Leporis RTS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 64bit Intel Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4570 CPU @ 3.20GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A sci-fi real-time strategy game. An existential war among asteroids in classic RTS style. Build and defend, produce and upgrade, attack and annihilate!
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
